ing.item: BY 26-INCH SHEET PAN TEMPERATURE: 400 F. OVEN

directions.step:
:
1. SCRUB POTATOES WELL; DRY; REMOVE ANY BLEMISHES. PLACE ON SHEET PANS.
2. PRICK SKIN WITH FORK TO ALLOW STEAM TO ESCAPE.
3. BAKE 45 MINUTES OR UNTIL DONE.
Recipe Number: Q06600
SERVING SIZE: 1 POTATO
From the <Army Master Recipe Index File> (actually used today!). Downloaded from Glen's MM Recipe Archive, http://www.erols.com/hosey.
